Description:
"In the ideal world, AI helps us get rid of all the toil." Anders Hejlsberg explains how the TypeScript team uses AI to handle the boring, repetitive tasks, like porting hundreds of pull requests from their old codebase to the new one. He shares a key lesson for all developers: identify the uninteresting work that costs you time and automate it.

#AndersHejlsberg #TypeScript #AI

Title: How TypeScript's creator uses AI
